name: Riley Thompson
persona: Riley is a third-year Business Administration student who has found some courses challenging but remains determined to complete their degree. While their CGPA is below the class average, Riley is motivated to improve and puts in steady, if sometimes inconsistent, effort. They occasionally struggle with test anxiety, which impacts their performance, but their perseverance and moderate self-discipline help them push through setbacks. Riley is seeking strategies to boost their academic confidence and time management skills.
